definition: very enthusiastic about something (often a hobby)
wanting to get something very much
the quality of being very enthusiastic about something
the science of electronics when used in designing and making aircraft
the electronic devices in an aircraft or a spacecraft

if a person or an organization holds the copyright on a piece of writing, music, etc., they are the only people who have the legal right to publish, broadcast, perform it, etc., and other people must ask their permission to use it or any part of it
the practice of obeying rules or requests made by people in authority
the quality of being too willing to agree with somebody or do what they want
the way in which something is formed; the structure of something, especially an animal
a person or company that is involved in a particular organization, project, system, etc., especially because they have invested money in it
a person who holds all the bets placed on a game or race and who pays the money to the winner
a long mass of sand at the point where a river meets the sea that is formed by the movement of the water
a raised area of sand in a river or the sea
not doing something; preventing something from existing or happening
to say clearly and often publicly what your opinion is, what you think is true, etc.
the act of saying clearly and often publicly what your opinion is, what you think is true, etc.
main; most important; basic
of the best quality; excellent
a prime example of something is one that is typical of it
most likely to be chosen for something; most suitable
made shorter, especially by leaving out letters or using only the first letter of each word
for a short time
in few words
a particle that has the same mass as a proton, but a negative electrical charge
covered with water
having something in large quantities
a pub or an inn
the side opposite the right angle of a right-angled triangle
a fact, an action or a way of behaving that is not usual, and that may be unacceptable

an opening that allows light to reach a lens, especially in cameras
a position in which the dancer balances on one leg with the other leg lifted and stretched out straight behind parallel to the ground
a type of design where lines wind around each other
a method of painting that avoids conscious thought and allows a free flow of ideas
made of a substance produced by chemical processes from a type of acid
the measurement of the position, movement and size of stars
a ghost or a ghost-like image of a person who is dead
using measurements of human features, such as fingers or eyes, in order to identify people
a kitchen utensil (= a tool) with a rough surface, used for grating food into very small pieces
feelings of respect and slight fear; feelings of being very impressed by something/somebody
to admire somebody/something and be slightly frightened of them/it
for a short time
a sheet of strong cloth that stretches out from above a door or window to keep off the sun or rain
if something goes awry, it does not happen in the way that was planned
not in the right position
true in such an obvious way that you do not need to prove it
a plant or bush with large flowers that may be pink, purple, white or yellow, often grown in a pot
the sound made by a sheep or lamb
to travel by asking for free rides in other people’s cars, by standing at the side of the road and trying to get passing cars to stop
to get a free ride in a person’s car; to travel around in this way, by standing at the side of the road and trying to get passing cars to stop
to pull up a piece of your clothing
to lift yourself into a higher position, or the position mentioned
to tie or fasten something to something else with a rope, a hook, etc.
to get married
a game for two people played on a board marked with long thin triangles. Players throw dice and move pieces around the board.
to produce a change in somebody/something
to attack somebody or a part of the body; to make somebody become ill
to make somebody feel very sad, sorry, etc. about somebody/something
to pretend to be feeling or thinking something
to use or wear something that is intended to impress other people
to make something more lively or full of energy

to make models, toys, images, etc. seem to move in a film, either by rapidly showing slightly different pictures of them in a series, one after another, or by using computer techniques to create moving images
to shout loudly, in order to show support or praise for somebody, or to encourage them
to encourage somebody or to give them hope or comfort
a quantity of work that should have been done already, but has not yet been done
relating to atoms or an atom
relating to the energy that is produced when atoms are split; related to weapons that use this energy
using, producing or resulting from nuclear energy
connected with weapons that use nuclear energy
of the nucleus (= central part) of an atom
by chance; in a way that was not planned
in a way that surprises you because you were not expecting it
growing or living in, on or near water
connected with water
very sorry for something bad that you have done
feeling or showing that you are sorry for something wrong that you have done
